dawn_of_the_dead.title: Dawn of the Dead
dawn_of_the_dead.overview: A group of survivors takes refuge in a shopping mall during a zombie apocalypse.

world_war_z.title: World War Z
world_war_z.overview: A former UN employee races against time to stop a global zombie pandemic.

resident_evil.title: Resident Evil
resident_evil.overview: Based on the popular video game, a special forces team fights zombies in an underground laboratory.

i_am_legend.title: I Am Legend
i_am_legend.overview: A scientist in a post-apocalyptic New York fights to find a cure for a virus that turned humans into dark-seekers.

data.title: Zombieland
data.overview: A quirky group of survivors navigate a zombie-infested world with humor and unorthodox strategies.

data.title: My Boyfriend is a Zombie
data.overview: A young woman falls in love with a charming zombie, challenging the boundaries between life and death.
